imdb.plot outline: There are incredible, untold stories of our favorite entertainers and public figures utilizing their celebrity to make a tremendous difference in the lives of others. Produced by Swirl Films, Inc., in association with Black Celebrity Giving, Changemakers is a docu-series that places a spotlight on the selflessness of celebrity. Whether through foundations and non-profit organizations, or individual efforts to advance community and global causes, it is both admirable and honorable when those who have much, give much. The Changemakers mission is to highlight the efforts and celebrate the achievements of these individuals, and the teams behind them who make it all possible. Through in-depth interviews and behind the scenes access, we tell the personal story of these Changemakers, and celebrate their impact on the world.
imdb.title: Changemakers
plot: _Changemakers_ (qv) is an inspiring docu-series which shines a light on celebrities using their influence to impact change in local and global communities.::Swirl Films

There are incredible, untold stories of our favorite entertainers and public figures utilizing their celebrity to make a tremendous difference in the lives of others. Produced by Swirl Films, Inc., in association with Black Celebrity Giving, _Changemakers_ (qv) is a docu-series that places a spotlight on the selflessness of celebrity. Whether through foundations and non-profit organizations, or individual efforts to advance community and global causes, it is both admirable and honorable when those who have much, give much. The _Changemakers_ (qv) mission is to highlight the efforts and celebrate the achievements of these individuals, and the teams behind them who make it all possible. Through in-depth interviews and behind the scenes access, we tell the personal story of these _Changemakers_ (qv), and celebrate their impact on the world.::Swirl Films
